io.hekate.metrics

Interface MetricsSource

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClusterNodeMetrics, LocalMetricsService, MetricsSnapshot, MetricsUpdateEvent

    public interface MetricsSource
    Base interface for components that provide metrics information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Metric> allMetrics()
      Returns the map of all available metrics.
      default long get(String name)
      Returns the value of a metric or 0 if there is no such metric.
      default long get(String name, long defaultVal)
      Returns the value of a metric or defaultVal if there is no such metric.
      default boolean has(String name)
      Returns true if metric with the specified name exists.
      Metric metric(String name)
      Returns a metric for with the specified name or null if there is no such metric.

    • Method Detail

      • allMetrics

        Map<String,Metric> allMetrics()
        Returns the map of all available metrics. Returns an empty map if there are no metrics available.
        Returns:
        Map of metrics or an empty map.

      • metric

        Metric metric(String name)
        Returns a metric for with the specified name or null if there is no such metric.
        Parameters:
        name - Metric name.
        Returns:
        Metric or null.

      • get

        default long get(String name,
                 long defaultVal)
        Returns the value of a metric or defaultVal if there is no such metric.
        Parameters:
        name - Metric name (see MetricConfigBase.setName(String)).
        defaultVal - Default value that should be returned if there is no such metric.
        Returns:
        Metric value or defaultVal if there is no such metric.

      • get

        default long get(String name)
        Returns the value of a metric or 0 if there is no such metric.
        Parameters:
        name - Metric name (see MetricConfigBase.setName(String)).
        Returns:
        Metric value or 0 if there is no such metric.

      • has

        default boolean has(String name)
        Returns true if metric with the specified name exists.
        Parameters:
        name - Metric name.
        Returns:
        true if metric exists.
